title: Comfort and Convenience 2BR/1BA
map_address: 2811 Cadiz Lane near Buchanan Rd & Gentrytown Dr
posting_body: ['Villa Medanos Apartments', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'x563', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', '2 BED 1 BATH - (income restrictions apply)  2 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 815 Sq.', 'Ft / $1,902', '* Unit 204 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 205 - Available', 'Now', 'Welcome to Villa Medanos!', 'This two-bedroom, one-bathroom model at Villa Medanos Apartments has everything you want in a comfortable home.', 'Sit on your favorite lounge chair and ottoman and unwind by the fireplace in the living room.', 'Afternoons become more relaxing when you spend it enjoying a cup of cappuccino on the patio or balcony.', 'Satisfy your pasta craving by preparing lasagna or spaghetti in the well-equipped kitchen.', 'After you’re done cooking, clean your kitchen towels and apron using your washer and dryer set.', 'Other features such as an individual climate control and carpeting provide added comfort.', 'When it comes to amenities, the features of this community stand out among other communities in Antioch.', 'Enjoy peaceful strolls around the community’s beautifully landscaped grounds.', 'Rejuvenate your mind and body with a visit to the swimming pool.', 'Enjoy the convenience and peace of mind that comes with covered parking spaces.', 'For inquiries, contact the leasing center today.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '*', 'Individual Climate Control', '* Private Patio and Balcony', '* Carpeting', '* Separate Dining Room', '* Washer/Dryer In Unit', '* Handrails', '* Heat', 'Property Amenities:', '* Pool', '* On-site Management', '* On-site Maintenance', '* Covered Parking', '* Night Patrol', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x563', 'Villa Medanos Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Address:', '2811 Cadiz Lane Antioch, CA 94509', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
